tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently underwent a dental implant procedure at Life Time Dental in Marathalli, Bengaluru, and I am delighted to share my outstanding experience with Dr. Sharon. My journey with Dr. Sharon began 15 years ago when I sought her expertise for a root canal and crown procedure. Remarkably, the crown she provided lasted a phenomenal 15 years, far surpassing the expected lifespan of 7 years. This alone speaks volumes about Dr. Sharon's proficiency and commitment to her patients' long-term oral health.

Returning to Dr. Sharon for the implant procedure, I was once again impressed by her exceptional skill and efficiency. From the moment I walked into her office, I felt reassured by her warm demeanor and confident approach. Dr. Sharon meticulously explained every aspect of the implant process, ensuring that I felt fully informed and comfortable throughout.

What truly sets Dr. Sharon apart is her unparalleled speed and efficiency in performing the implant procedure. In my opinion, she is unmatched in her field, delivering results with remarkable precision and swiftness. The implant she provided not only looks incredibly natural but also functions flawlessly, enhancing both my smile and confidence.

I must also commend the entire team at Life Time Dental for their professionalism and dedication to patient care. From the receptionists to the dental assistants, everyone contributed to making my experience seamless and enjoyable.

In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Sharon and Life Time Dental to anyone seeking top-notch dental care in Bengaluru. Dr. Sharon's exceptional skill, coupled with her dedication to patient satisfaction, makes her the go-to dentist for anyone in need of dental implants or other procedures. Thank you, Dr. Sharon, for your outstanding service and for restoring my smile with the fastest and most efficient implant in the country!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

review: Well furnished and hygienic. Doctor’s behaviour is good and explanations are very helpful . The clinic is not for the lower middle class people like me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had recently visited Lifetime Dental to cure my ailing tooth during the lockdown. Obviously, I was very apprehensive of visiting the clinic given the current situation and tried to defer the visit for long. I had cancelled my appointment once before finally making up my mind to see the doctor. I stepped into the clinic with lot of notions and concerns about being safe however within few minutes of my visit to clinic, all of those concerns were swept off. Upon my entry, they asked me to wear a shoe cover and sanitize my hands. They took temperature reading and a pulse oximeter reading and then asked me to remove my mask and place it in a paper bag to avoid any contamination. After all this, I could see the doctor. The doctor listened to my problem with patience and intent, took some X-rays and started the treatment. The doctor who treated me was wearing masks, face-shield, and a PPE kit as a precautionary measure to ensure safety vice-versa.  The doctors were very professional and my whole experience of visiting the clinic was just wonderful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Fantastic experience with Dr Sharon! She explained everything beforehand very well. The wisdom tooth extraction went smoothly in her hands. Utmost care was taken. Very professional. 
And Dr Gayatri on her team has to be mentioned for a thorough job done
I have been a regular at Lifetime Dental for over a decade
Many thanks Dr Sharon

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Implant Fixing,Dental Cavities,Dental Cleaning,
review: Dr.Sharon and her team at Lifetime Dental Clinic are true professionals who have helped with all my dental needs. The clinic uses state-of-the-art technology during my procedures and the support staff kept me informed of all the steps and were incredibly knowledgeable. I had even been to the clinic in the midst of COVID during which the hygiene level was top-notch. I also appreciate the fact that I can call Dr.Sharon for any dental questions and she addresses them immediately and patiently. Overall, I go to the clinic every 6 months for a check-up and would highly recommend this clinic based on my extremely positive experience!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Teeth Bleaching Treatment,Scaling / Polishing,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review: When I had first visited her 3 years back for an impacted wisdom tooth extraction and dental crown, I was very much satisfied with the treatment. That's why I decided to visit her again for removal of another impacted wisdom tooth. Since I had travelled from a place 2600 kilometres from her clinic and I just had a day to stay in Bangalore, I decided to get RCT, bleaching and scaling too along with extraction. She is very helpful and she made sure that everything was done on time with no delay at all. All the procedures were done seamlessly. My brother who is very much scared of RCTs got 3 RCTs done at her clinic and he didn't even realise how smoothly it was done. Next time if he ever has to visit a dentist, he said he is going to her clinic straight away and I totally agree with him !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited the clinic for dental crown related issues. I am a senior citizen and hence initially I was hesitant to visit any clinic or hospital due to the current Covid scenario. However, due to severity of my tooth condition, I decided to visit Lifetime dental based on their positive reviews and suggestions from my friends. When I visited the clinic, I was really impressed the way they are maintaining all the precautionary measures not only to safeguard patients but also the doctors and staff. All the doctors and staff are truly professional, ethical and friendly. It was beyond one could imagine or see in normal clinic or hospital, especially during these Pandemic times. This encouraged me to get the treatment done right away. I am thankful to Dr Sharon & her team of experts for providing such a wonderful experience while treating my dental issues. I would strongly recommend and urge everyone to visit this clinic for any dental related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Sharon is an amazing doctor who knows the diagnosis like the back of her hand. She is able to explain the treatment very well. She is also amazingly qualified and kind. 
The most important thing, in the times of COVID 19, while other clinics haven't been upto the mark, Lifetime Dental has been amazingly clean with all precautionary measures followed. This is the clinic to go to for the best dental care in Bengaluru. I sincerely thank Dr Sharon and her team of dedicated doctors from the bottom of my heart for her amazing treatment and the commitment she has shown in these testing times.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I just had a great experience at the dentist at Lifetime Dental. I don't usually write reviews online but this exclusive was exceptional. Because of the lockdown I was very apprehensive about visiting a clinic because of the whole safety precautions thing. So I waited out as long as I could.

I called up the clinic to enquire about safety precautions they took, and they were responsive and friendly and convinced it would be okay.

There was a sanitizer at the entrance, and I was allowed to enter the 'disinfected area' only after some checks and they asked me to remove my mask since that could be contaminated.

Dr. Sharon placed me at ease from the moment due walked into our office. After the diagnosis she layed out my options clearly (I was surprised). My teeth are fixed and my pain is gone. The team also seemed professional and considere. Overall great experience :)

review: It was my first visit for my dental issue. As customary I was very scared about the quandary as I had extreme pain for more than a week. All the staff is very helpful. Last but not the least is hygiene of the place also needs to be appreciated keeping the Corona times in mind.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Crowns,Dental Cleaning,
review: High degree of professionalism and high quality doctors + facilities.  I live in the SF bay area and was nervous about seeing a different dentist than my regular one back home that I've been going to for over a decade (and had a bad experience with a dentist in India on the last trip).  However, Dr Sharon's practice is top notch and all the services I received were delivered with exceptional skill and for a fraction of the cost (cleaning, xrays, crown replacements and root canal).  The xray equipment and the crown quality are actually better than the standard insurance covered ones back in the US.  The dentists and endodontists communicate well, get patient buy-in, are kind and compassionate, and most importantly they are well experienced and highly skilled.  This is an efficiently run practice where appointments times are punctual and the front desk is warm and welcoming.  I would not hesitate to return to this clinic or recommend it to anyone.

Her only concern is her patients’ well being and this is very hard to find in these days. Thanks Doc and see you soon!

review: I had called Dr Sharon at 8 pm on Saturday evening for my father's increasing tooth and jaw pain. She responded on phone she asked us to see her on Sunday Very few doctors are available on Sunday, so I was grateful to her. She took time to explain the condition, treatment options to all three of us (my parents and myself) patiently. We were satisfied with the treatment and received few calls next day to enquire about patient condition. I would recommend Dr Sharon to anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr Sharon is very good at her work .. love the reassuring feeling she gives at any visit or dental issues . Her smile and personal care she imparts imbibes positive vibes 
I feel very comfortable today with the newly installed  crowns no side effect pain discomfort what so ever .

tags: Value for money,
review: Complete cost of treatment should be done prior to start of the treatment, all the option and pricing should be done prior to the treatment after doing root canal and post that discussion of cost of crown and make decisions on the spot is wrong. **** ****** ** *** **** **** **** *** **** *** ** ** ** ******
reply_text:
We always give the complete cost of treatment to the patient before starting. As  I don’t know who you are I am unable to trace why this happened.
Nevertheless you had the option of doing the crown elsewhere.
We provide the best quality of crown ensuring a real tooth feel.
Intraoral scanners do real time scans of the tooth structure and helps in achieving the best fitting crown .
Endodontist uses sterilised files for each patient and following disinfection protocols while performing root canals ,resulting in painless treatment and no mishaps.
 We have been charging the same for root canal treatment.
All this has helped us in keeping up the quality of treatment & delivering the best always.
